Wild Magic Cube

A weekly cube event in Western Mass

Wild Magic Cube

A weekly cube draft event in Hadley, MA

We aim to foster an inclusive environment for social interaction and friendly competition.

We collectively learn and improve at Magic together as a community, lowering the emotional stakes of the entire process.

Avoiding a tournament structure promotes positive interactions and improves accessibility to newer players.

Time and Place

Join us on Thursdays nights at X9 Games in Hadley, MA (Hampshire Mall, by the food court).

Check-in is at 5:30PM, draft fires at 6PM.

Cubes

The eponymous Wild Magic Cube
